page.title: 19THE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Comprises 7 members of the Parish who select Chairman annually.A clerk is employed who is responsible for all correspondence & finance INCOME 1984/5 Precept-Â£450, Concurrent Function- Â£581, product of penny rate levied by N.Herts.District Council.EXPENDITURE Maintenance grants-recreation ground, Fordham Memorial Hall,mowing of Church yard & greens.Periodic improvements to village facilities e.g.notice boards, bus shelter,flagpole,upkeep of War Me- morial & tree planting projects(30 pl- anted 1984/5).FUNCTION Responsible for competing in Herts. Best Kept Village, winning for 6th time in 1985.Used by County & District Councils to reflect local needs & opinions. Used by commu- nity to direct complaints & suggestion to these authorities.Consulted on all planning applications & recent Rural Settlement Study to form new policies.
